body.name: Masthome Broom and Dustpan Set, Upright Stand Dustpan and Broom with Long Handle, Dustpan with Broom Combo for Home Kitchen Room Office Lobby
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ◆Excellent Dusting Function◆ Our broom is designed with three layers of dense bristles, which can provide a larger surface area to capture dust, and can capture dust and dirt more effectively. The dustpan is designed with rubber lips and the soft edge conforms better to the floor, helping to capture more dust to ensure dust and debris enters the dustpan rather than under it.

◆Long Handle Broom and Dustpan Set◆ The height of the broom and dustpan handles can be adjusted. The broom can be adjusted to 37 inch or 54 inch long, suitable for most people's height, so you don't need to bend over when cleaning. And the broom head can be rotated 180°, allowing you to easily clean the bottom of sofa, bed and other furniture.

◆Built-in Comb Design◆ The dustpan is equipped with a row of 3cm long comb teeth, which can easily remove hair, cotton thread, dust and debris attached to the broom bristles. You don't need to clean the broom by hand after cleaning, keeping your hands clean.

◆High Quality◆ The broom and dustpan handles are made of sturdy stainless steel, which makes this dustpan and broom set durable. The large-capacity windproof dustpan doesn't have to worry about the dirt in the dustpan spilling outside when it is in use. And the dustpan can be locked in open position for easy emptying.

◆Space Saving◆ Due to the compact design of the upright dustpan and broom, it is not only easy to store and move, but also does not take up much space. You can fix the broom inside the dustpan by the clip on the dustpan handle, then fold the dustpan and place it upright in any corner.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Masthome Long Handled Dustpan and Brush Sets The dustpan and brush sets with rubber front lip that is close to the floors firmly and it will not leave any dust.The soft broom bristles can effectively pick up dirt dust and pet hair from floor with minimal effort. Size: Dustpan: 27x26x80cm /10.6x10.2x31.5in Broom: 126cm / 49.6in

Thick Broom Bristles Soft bristles can catch dust and hair on the ground. The edge is at a 45 ° angle, which is conducive to the deep cleaning of gaps and wall corners. Easy to Collect Dust The rubber lip with micro curve at the front edge of the dust pan can keep close to the ground to the maximum extent and prevent dust residue. Comb Design The dust collection tray is designed with a toothed comb, which makes it easy to scrape the bristles off the broom bristles. Easy Storage Broom and dustpan can be connected through intelligent latch. Suitable storage, dustpan and broom can be stored together, beautiful and tidy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A clean sweep!
reviews.reviewText: Not a bad set, it's not commercial quality but does fine for household use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, easy to store
reviews.reviewText: Like the organic wood, and overall quality of material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Little Lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I love the concept but it's pretty lightweight and fragile. I don't think it will last long. I do enjoy using it though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comes apart after 5 months
reviews.reviewText: After four months of use and hanging it by the handle, the three different shaft pieces would slide off onto the floor. I have to place a screw on each joint in order to keep the sections together. A second concern is that the bristles are good for sweeping the floor and the broom is light weight. However, the bristles are not strong enough to sweep dead grass off from a low pile rug. If the bristles were just a little thicker or stiff, this would be a great combination. I have two different brooms that are very similar. I purchased this one because the bottom of the broom can be adjusted. Although it is lighter and easier to use, the fact that it came apart at the joints and the bristles are too light for sweeping off a flat run, I would recommend something different to avoid these issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only drawback is the bristles on the broom are ultra fine so it works best on kitchen floors, bathroom floors. Hopefully I to I'm currently using it in my basement and that floor is too rough for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dustpan doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: Didn't work at all. I bought for my office and had to return. The plastic strip on the edge of the dustpan was curled and warped in a way that made it impossible to brush dirt into the dustpan - in essence the plastic strip made the dustpan completely defective. Poor materials are likely the cause - if the plastic had been more rigid it would have worked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Masthome Broom and Dustpan Set with Long Handle, 180° Rotating Broom and Large Capacity D
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for this kind of broom, have never used one like this. But had surgery and this came to mind.Very convenient and easy to use. The broom is very cool because as you sweep under the cabinets it tilts at a slight angle to get under better. I us the teeth on the top of the dustpan all the time, works really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally found what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a soft bristled broom with a regular length handle (some sold online are very short). This is just right. The dust bin feature that removes debris for you is a bonus.
